Package org.wildfly.security.auth.provider

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticatedRealmIdentity
    A representation of a post-authentication identity.
    CredentialDecoder
    A decoder which acquires an authentication name from a credential.
    RealmIdentity
    A representation of a pre-authentication identity.
    SecurityRealm
    A single authentication realm.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeyStoreBackedSecurityRealm
    A KeyStore backed SecurityRealm implementation.
    SecurityDomain
    A security domain.
    SecurityDomain.Builder  
    SecurityIdentity
    A loaded and authenticated security identity.
    ServerAuthenticationContext
    Server-side authentication context.
    SimpleMapBackedSecurityRealm
    Simple map-backed security realm.
    X509CertificateCredentialDecoder
    A credential decoder which can decode an X509Certificate.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CredentialSupport
    The level of support for a type of credential.
    SupportLevel
    The different support levels.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RealmUnavailableException
    An exception to indicate a general underlying failure of the realm.
